title: Azerbaijan exempts customs duty on rice import from Pakistan till 2027
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 23 (APP): Azerbaijan’s government has announced an exemption of customs duty on rice imports from Pakistan till December 31, 2027.
According to a tweet from Ambassador of Azerbaijan to Pakistan Khazar Farhadov, “The rice import from Pakistan to Azerbaijan is exempted from customs duty until December 31, 2027”.
He said this tax exemption announcement would significantly increase trade turnover and enhance our brotherly ties.
